name: Oh Crap! Asteroids & Aliens
description:
The year is 3000. After surviving countless challenges, mankind thought they would finally be able to take a break.

Oh boy, were they wrong.

Some alien species decided they really didn't like planet Earth, and now they're attacking it relentlessly. Not only that, asteroids are being cast towards the planet. Crazy stuff.

Use missiles and position your shields to protect the planet while the Earth's nations deploy powerful weapons to help you face the incoming space crises. A completely chaotic and addictive bullet hell game.

CONTROLS:
A, D - Rotate shields / Aim
Space - Fire weapon
Mouse - Click on the power-up card to use it. Hover it on a card to read its effects.

SPECIAL COMMANDS:
Shuriken: Use W and S to expand or retract the shuriken shield
Laser Sword: left-click to rotate the sword faster

Check the in-game "How to Play" section for more details.

Submission for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 which theme was "Let there be chaos".

Programming / VFX - Kyota Poeti
Graphic / UI / Game Design / Art - Kayo Torres
Music / Sound Effects - Daniel Christian (SoundFont+)
